metadata.dc:author: Miyaoka, R
Olivares, J M
Bigozzi, M A
Riccetto, C
Palma, P
metadata.dc:description: Reports on postoperative complications of anti-incontinence surgery followed the widespread use of synthetic slings. In this paper we describe the more frequent complications, such as obstruction, pelvic hematoma, bladder and urethral injuries, to facilitate the management of these complications.
metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento de complicaciones post-cirug√≠as antiincontinencia con "sling".
[Treatment of post-surgical complications antiincontinence with "sling"].
